title: BitcSeo
author: BitcSeo
content: Finally, bitcointalk community has included Nigeria (one of the most active audience in  Africa after china when it come to btc tradingSeparated from bunch of other countries.Note to Nigerian's : pls donot abuse the privilige. Use it wisely.Btcseo 》Rome

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Since I got notification for this thread, have revisited it twice... But I no still understand watin u mean by this statement.. was beginning to think that's you just notice our local board recently, but after going  through your trust view   I realized you have been on the local body b4. So watin really be the point of diz thread, abi d forum don give Nigerians special trading board.
